content:
Hi!! The course website says that the highest the cutoff will be for an F in this class in a 60. Am I understanding correctly that a 60 is a passing grade in this course?

Thanks so much and take care!
subject: Passing grade?

content:
<md>We do not post final letter grade cutoffs, but the highest the cutoff will be is:

*   A: 90
*   B: 80
*   C: 70
*   D: 60
*   F: below 60</md>
